features: Super soft cushioning: Reconfigured midsole has even more DNA LOFT cushioning for Brooks' softest-ever ride, without sacrificing responsiveness or durability. An OrthoLite® sockliner provides premium step-in comfort
Plush internal fit: Mesh upper and plush interior liner surround your foot, for a snug but flexible fit
Plush transitions: Full-length DNA LOFT through the midsole makes the move from heel to toe feel incredibly soft and smooth
